about_the_game:
[Idle Sphere - Starter Pack]

Unleash your full potential with this exclusive pack designed to enhance your Idle Sphere experience! Packed with powerful boosts and additional resources, this DLC is perfect for players looking to elevate their gameplay.

DLC Contents:

  • Sphere Multiplier x1.5 – Earn spheres, the game’s core currency, faster and watch your progress soar.

  • Offline Bonus x2 - You will be able to make much more progress while you are offline!

  • EXP Multiplier x1.35 – Level up even quicker with a bonus to all experience gained.

  • Automation and No Cost Unlock Progress +0.1 – Reach automation milestones with ease,

  • 2000 Chaotics – Boost your resources instantly with 2000 additional Chaotics to accelerate your journey.

Why Get This Pack?

This pack is perfect for new players looking to kickstart their adventure or for seasoned players who want to optimize their progress and explore advanced features. Get ahead, reach new heights, and enjoy Idle Sphere like never before with these exclusive benefits!
